techmeme.title: UFC signs a wide-ranging, multimillion-dollar, multiple-year sponsorship deal with Meta, which will be its "official fan technology partner" (Alex Sherman/CNBC)
Roblox rolls out new parental controls, including letting parents block and report specific people on their child's friends list, building on changes from 2024 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Documents: the NLRB froze Janneke Parrish and Cher Scarlett's cases against Apple pending a review after Trump nominated an Apple attorney as general counsel (Michael Acton/Financial Times)
X users are asking Grok to fact-check posts by tagging @grok, often during political or historical arguments, as a new passive aggressive way to dunk on others (Katie Notopoulos/Business Insider)
In a March 28 brief, X asked SCOTUS to shield user data from US law enforcement without "probable cause", in Coinbase user James Harper's long-running case (Financial Times)
